title: AI, Crypto, Debt: World Economic Forum Chief Warns Of 3 Major Bubbles
description: The world should watch out for three possible bubbles in financial markets, including artificial intelligence, the head of the World Economic Forum said on Wednesday, in comments that came amid sharp falls in global technology stocks.
content:

title: AMD forecasts fourth-quarter revenue above estimates on strong AI chip demand
description: ADVANCED Micro Devices forecast fourth-quarter revenue above market estimates on Tuesday, betting on the multibillion-dollar expansions of data center infrastructure to boost demand for its artificial intelligence chips.
content:

title: IBM to cut thousands of jobs in fourth quarter amid software focus
description: IBM will cut roles this quarter, the company said on Tuesday, potentially impacting thousands of employees while it shifts focus toward its high-margin software segment, as Wall Street hones in on the company’s ability to benefit from artificial intelligence (AI)-linked cloud demand.
content: IBM will cut roles this quarter, the company said on Tuesday, potentially impacting thousands of employees while it shifts focus toward its high-margin software segment, as Wall Street hones in on the company’s ability to benefit from artificial inte... [1072 chars]

title: Get ready for the AI crash...maybe?
description: OVER the past couple of weeks, there has been a virtual explosion of stories about artificial intelligence (AI) in both the regular and social media, all of which have titles like, “The AI bubble is about to pop,” or “Is the AI bubble about to pop?” This all apparently started after an article from Bloomberg, which was accompanied by a “bubble” graphic that has since been shared probably millions of times online, detailing the circular nature of the AI ecosystem.
content: OVER the past couple of weeks, there has been a virtual explosion of stories about artificial intelligence (AI) in both the regular and social media, all of which have titles like, “The AI bubble is about to pop,” or “Is the AI bubble about to pop?” ... [6063 chars]

title: ’Too much of a good thing can be bad’
description: STUDENTS have been freely using generative artificial intelligence (AI) to assist in schoolwork. It is no longer surprising to hear them respond — when asked how they managed to finish all their requirements so efficiently — “Oh, I used AI to write it.”

title: Xania Monet: the first AI artist to crack a Billboard radio chart
description: The AI-powered act known as Xania Monet has become the first artificial intelligence–driven artist to appear on a Billboard radio airplay chart.
content: A new milestone in music history has emerged: the AI-powered act known as Xania Monet has become the first artificial intelligence–driven artist to appear on a Billboard radio airplay chart, reaching No. 30 on the Adult R&B Airplay survey for the wee... [2018 chars]

title: Penang company Silicon X scores a first
description: Penang has achieved another technological milestone with the creation of Malaysia's first locally designed semiconductor chip, a Field Programmable Gate Array (FPGA) developed by Penang-based Silicon X, with applications spanning artificial intelligence (AI), automotive systems and advanced LED display technologies.

title: Strengthening Ties: The Robust India-Japan Partnership in the Indo-Pacific
description: India and Japan solidify their strategic partnership, enhancing stability in the Indo-Pacific. Focused on supply chains, artificial intelligence, and clean energy, this alliance aims to bolster economic growth and uphold a free Indo-Pacific, with initiatives like the Indo-Pacific Oceans' Initiative leading the charge.
content: The India-Japan partnership is proving pivotal in bolstering strategic stability in the sensitive Indo-Pacific region, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar emphasized at a recent forum. Their shared vision aims to promote a 'free and open' Indo-Pac... [785 chars]

title: India unveils landmark AI governance guidelines - know what changes for startups, developers
description: The artificial intelligence guidelines are designed to strike a balance between innovation and accountability.
content:
The IT ministry on Wednesday published a seven-point AI 'governance' framework under the IndiaAI Mission—the nodal body tasked with developing built-from-scratch AI models native to Indian languages.

title: Google will launch AI bots into space to save Earth from costly carbon demands
description: Bosses said artificial intelligence data centres in space are needed to cope with the Earth’s rising demand for AI.
content:
